category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_Recyclate_Material_Classification_IDs
preference.preference_description: Specifies the Material classification IDs for which Recyclate information needs to validated. The preference IMDS_recyclate_validation needs to be set to enable or disable the validation. The default values are: 1 2 3 4 5 7.1 7.2
